Frequently Asked Questions

How long does a typical project take?

Project timelines vary based on scope. Siding installation typically takes 3-7 days, window replacement 1-3 days, and door installation usually completed in a single day.

Do you offer free estimates?

Yes! We provide free, no-obligation estimates for all projects. Contact us to schedule a convenient time for your consultation.

Are you licensed and insured?

Absolutely. Maia Construction is fully licensed and insured to work throughout Massachusetts. We carry comprehensive liability and workers' compensation insurance.

What warranty do you offer?

We stand behind our work with a comprehensive warranty on both materials and labor. Specific warranty terms vary by product and are detailed in your contract.

Do you handle permits?

Yes, we handle all necessary permits and inspections as part of our service. This ensures your project meets all local building codes.

Maia Construction

Professional siding, door, and window installation serving Massachusetts. Quality craftsmanship with over a decade of experience.
